snippet: Security forces in the city of Maiduguri shot dead dozens of young men whom they accused of belonging to the radical Islamic sect Boko Haram.
abstract: Spiral of violence in northern Nigeria takes another deadly turn as security forces in Maiduguri shoot dead dozens of young men whom they accused of belonging to radical Islamic sect Boko Haram.

byline.contributor: Hamza Idris contributed from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Security forces in the city of Maiduguri shot dead dozens of young men whom they accused of belonging to the radical Islamic sect Boko Haram.

headline.seo: Nigeria Forces Kill Dozens in Night Assault
headline.main: Nigerian Forces Kill Dozens in Night Assault, Fueling Long Battle With Sect
headline.print_headline: Nigerian Forces Kill Dozens in Night Assault, Fueling Long Battle With Sect
